clinical_study.brief_title: Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation in the ICU
clinical_study.official_title: Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation in the ICU

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators objective is to assess quality of life and functional outcome in patients requiring short-term mechanical ventilation. Additionally, the investigators plan to measure the recovery of peripheral muscle strength and respiratory muscle strength during recovery.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to one year after discharge
primary_outcome.description: SF-36, Katz, respiratory muscle strength and handgrip strength will be measured

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ICU patients who require mechanical ventilation for at least 2 days
- the ability to speak English
- willing to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients who require mechanical ventilation at home before hospitalization
- patients previously requiring mechanical ventilation at an LTAC facility
